org.springframework.webflow.engine.model.builder.xml

Class DefaultDocumentLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.webflow.engine.model.builder.xml.DefaultDocumentLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentLoader

    public class DefaultDocumentLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements DocumentLoader
    The default document loader strategy for XSD-based XML documents with validation enabled by default.

    Note: full XSD support requires JDK 5.0 or a capable parser such as Xerces 2.0. JDK 1.4 or less do not fully support XSD out of the box. To use this implementation on JDK 1.4 make sure Xerces is available in your classpath or disable XSD validation by setting the validating property to false.

    Author:
    Keith Donald

        public void setEntityResolver(org.xml.sax.EntityResolver entityResolver)
